>>37766001

You rush forward, pike ready. The next soldier is one of sandstone, but seems brittle on the inside, as your weapon breaks through.

There's a pleasant sound of stone chips clattering to the ground. It's not dead yet, but you force him to the wall, trying to prevent another attack.

Tatsumaki leaps to your side, shattering the soldier's stone head with a haymaker and a high-pitched kiai.

> Tatsumaki defeated Guardian Construct. [[ Party: Vision, Ascheritte, Nel, Ayla ]]

From where you just left, you hear gunfire, as Ayla and Vision have formed a makeshift gun platform, firing at the third guardian in the adjacent corner. They manage to cut it down before it arrives.

> Ayla defeated Guardian Construct. [[ Party: Vision, Tatsumaki, Nel, Ascheritte ]]

"Not bad. Anything on 'em?" You ask, as you return.

"Just more of these goddamn spears and helmets." Vision sighs.

"It's alright," Ayla says. "There's bound to be something down here."

The four of you team up on the last Construct. There's a wooden double-door at the far end of the walkway that seems unlocked; it looks like it's been pushed slightly open.

> Go inside.
> Rendezvous with Nel.
> Wait until Nel's done, and have him investigate.
> Wait outside, and talk to the other party.
